document.full_text: "every marine a rifleman" still applies as a defining slogan of the corps, but it comes second to what is demanded each day by a non-infantry unit's primary mission.
document.title: at war: going to war: part 1
lines_and_colors: "every marine a rifleman" still applies as a defining slogan of the corps, but it comes second to what is demanded each day by a non-infantry unit's primary mission.
